item.title: Anxiety Builds at CBS News Over Potential Moves by Skydance
item.description: The journalists at CBS News are eager to report out details of what might happen to their own workplace. Staffers at the unit, now part of Paramount Skydance, are worried about the potential for a new

item.title: ‘CBS Evening News’ Executive Producer Guy Campanile to Return to ’60 Minutes’
item.description: Guy Campanile, a longtime “60 Minutes” producer who was tasked with managing a significant overhaul of the venerable “CBS Evening News,” is returning to his old stomping ground
